sentences.sContent: a book depicting life in pre-revolutionary Russia
sentences.sCn: 描写革命前俄国人生活的一本书

hwds.w: describe  v. say what is like

remMethod.val: de(加强) + pict(描画) → 描绘

trans.tranCn: 描绘； 描写， 描述
trans.tranOther: to describe something or someone in writing or speech, or to show them in a painting, picture etc
